price: Ammas ati ishee keessatti dheebochuu dhabuufi aduun gubachuu dhabuunis siif jira.”
arabic: وَأَنَّكَ لَا تَظۡمَؤُاْ فِيهَا وَلَا تَضۡحَىٰ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-annaka lā taẓma-u fīhā walā taḍḥā
